description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: International Radio Show in Berlin; assembly line experiment at Volkswagon plant; Ruhr district's research into conversion of coal into oil and gas; Federal Research Institute for Forestry and Timber; Museum village in the Bavaraian Woods houses restored examples of peasant culture and crafts; world wide popularity of relatively new sport of gliding started in Hesse and at the stadium in Dusseldorf athletes compete for the World Cup.
